description: Elon Musk, a South African immigrant to the US has threatened to buy Hasbro, the parent company of Wizards of the Coast. Dungeons & Dragons is already facing a tough time, but this aligns with Musk’s recent business philosophy of acquiring dying brands and making them even more dying. Elon posted the message “How much...
title: Future Taxi Company Owner and Wannabe Space Colonizer Threatens to Put His Grubby Paws on D&D
